member.name: INTERACTION_ID
member.summary: Specifies the interaction states used for configuring an Interaction Context object. Interactions can be static (single contact with no manipulation, such as tap, double tap, right tap, press and hold) or dynamic (one or more contacts with manipulation, such as translation, rotation, or scaling).

member.name: INTERACTION_ID.INTERACTION_ID_MANIPULATION
member.summary: A compound gesture that supports translation, rotation, and scaling (dynamic).

summary.para: A right click gesture (static), regardless of input device. Typically used for displaying a context menu.

item.description: Touch or pen press and hold

member.name: INTERACTION_ID.INTERACTION_ID_CROSS_SLIDE
member.summary: Select or move through slide or swipe gestures (dynamic).
